model

Class Mobile_Elements

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Mobile_Elements
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fire_Ball, Lorann_Mobile, Monster_1, Monster_2, Monster_3, Monster_4

    public class Mobile_Elements
extends Object
    Mobile Elements is the class inherited by the moving objects of the game such as Lorann and the fireball.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    ptorc
